backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, templates, bio pages, OTP storage, subscription tracking, and helper functions plus authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for error-handling improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all frontend files, describing key components, pages, hooks, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root container and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout, auth/registration guards, and routes for all major pages.
frontend/src/components/BioFormulaHelper: Component offering an expandable card that explains a four-part bio formula and inserts a starter template.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, authentication handling, and optional Pro-only upload link.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Editor UI for adding, updating, and deleting link items with inputs for title, URL, and description.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: Component to upload and preview a payment QR image with progress tracking and removal.
frontend/src/components/PhoneOtpGate.tsx: Multi-step phone verification flow allowing OTP request, entry, validation, and success state.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Editor for managing social handle entries with platform selection and fields for username and URL.
frontend/src/components/TemplateBadge.ts: Displays a styled badge for template tags like creator favorite, trending, or most used.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Template preview card showing name, description, badge, and navigation to a template detail page.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines the list of supported template categories and corresponding type.
frontend/src/constants/platformCopy.ts: Contains shared platform messaging strings for system prompts and About Us content.
frontend/src/constants/subscriptionBenef: Defines premium and pro subscription benefit lists plus helper functions to retrieve tier-specific benefit text.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Provides a set of curated default bio-page templates with encoded content for use when backend templates are unavailable.
frontend/src/data/topInfluencers.ts: Exports a categorized list of top influencers with their Instagram handles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, handling auth state changes and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, persistence, and context provider with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend API calls in react-query hooks for user profiles, registration, phone verification, OTP, and templates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, typography, and screenshot-protection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page displaying platform copy and three highlighted features with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements subscription checkout with UPI payment options, reference input, and confirmation logic.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the marketing homepage with hero content, value props, and login or template navigation flow.
frontend/src/pages/PhoneVerificationPage: Shows phone OTP verification and redirects to signup once verified.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays Premium and Pro subscription plans, benefits, and gating messages, with navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Fetches and renders a public bio page with title, text, social handles, and links, or shows errors/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Handles phone verification and profile creation during signup, with error handling and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Displays a template’s details, prevents screenshots, and provides local bio generation with copy and external links.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Loads a template for editing, handles prerequisite checks, and allows creating and sharing personalized bio pages.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Shows all templates with category filtering, badge labels, loading states, and fallback error UI.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Allows Pro users to upload new templates with thumbnail handling, validation, and server submission.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and detects prerequisite-related issues.
frontend/src/utils/bioAssistant.ts: Generates offline, rule-based bio suggestions using prompt analysis and category-specific templates.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Provides helpers to build UPI payment links, open Google Pay or PhonePe via deep links, and copy text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests related to role‑assignment errors and Create & Share flow failures.
